name: market for petroleum combustion, in drilling tests | petroleum combustion, in drilling tests | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/34/documentation

This is a market activity. Each market represents the consumption mix of a product in a given geography, connecting suppliers with consumers of the same product in the same geographical area. Markets group the producers and also the imports of the product (if relevant) within the same geographical area. They also account for transport to the consumer and for the losses during that process, when relevant.;This is the market for  'petroleum combustion, in drilling tests', in the Global geography.;No transport required.

This activity starts at the gate of the activities that produce 'petroleum combustion, in drilling tests',  within the geography of Global.

This activity ends with the supply of  petroleum combustion, in drilling tests', to the consumers of this product. Transport or losses are considered irrelevant for this product.
